channel.title: How to host on a dedicated server?
channel.description:
Does anyone have a guide on how to run a runescape private server on a dedicated server?
Running linux.
Server is a duel core, 2 gb ram. Unmetered 100Mbit line.
So if anyone has a guide or something of the sort I would be really happy.
Thanks

item.title: How to host on a dedicated server?
item.dc:creator: @peterpan peterpan
item.description:
@peterpan wrote:

I already own the dedicated server. It is pre-paid for 1 year.

I just need to have a guide on how to install it on the server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2008, 06:18:25 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: How to host on a dedicated server?

item.title: How to host on a dedicated server?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

why not install windows and run yourself? your comp rox
or find a local hoster, instead of paying outrageous dedication billz
aside, here
http://www.google.com/search?q=dedicated+server&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&aq=t&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a
edit- if you run gentoo i luv you :]

item.title: How to host on a dedicated server?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

You have to use the ssh client and make a shh file to run the server remotly.
